textAfterTable: Directions: Sled riding hill in the Toledo area at Harrison Lake State Park. Comments: None Disclaimer: The webmaster of SledRiding.com is in no way responsible for trespassing (due to false information) and/or injury or death of any person or persons on any hills listed on this website. Go sledding at your own risk. With that said, check out the snow sleds here! This hill has missing data (unknowns). Click here to submit an update today!
